name: gmail-xoauth
description: Generate xoauth string from oauth 1.0 token for Gmail IMAP login. The logic is taken from http://code.google.com/p/google-mail-xoauth-tools/source/browse/trunk/python/xoauth.py
author: Yehezkiel Syamsuhadi <yehezkielbs@gmail.com> and modified by Charles Cary <charles@greedytrees.com>
